entities.description: Professional treatment received over the phone or through video for alcohol or drug use.
Peer support specialist or recovery coach help received.
Unmet need for substance treatment due to the cost being too high.

relationships.description: Indicates the respondent received professional treatment over the phone or through video for substance use.
Indicates the respondent received help from a peer support specialist or recovery coach.
Indicates that the respondent had an unmet need for substance treatment due to high cost.
Specifies the type of substance treatment received over the phone or through video.
Specifies the type of substance treatment received with peer support help.
Identifies the reason for not receiving substance use treatment, such as treatment cost.
